A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Didn't expect it to be a serious drama\, but it had way too much campy humor.  The chase plot is weak.  The Casino sub plot was pointless in many ways and shoe horned in.  Luke was underutilized.  Don't even get me started on Leia.  I'm usually easily entertained and very forgiving of movies\, I loved Force Awakens and Rogue One.  This was a major disappointment after waiting so long.  There are a couple redeeming factors\, like some ship battles and light saber scenes\, but overall I was underwhelmed.  I hope Episode 9 can get this back on track.
